agentUtterance.text: I apologize for the inconvenience. I have checked the warranty status of your product and it is still under warranty. This is a issue many users faced recently, this is due to the old graphics chipset. You are eligible for a replacement.

userUtterance.text: Thank you. How long will the return process take?

agentUtterance.text: The return process usually takes 7-10 business days. We will send you a confirmation email once the return is processed.

userUtterance.text: Okay, thank you for your assistance
